madLibs.zoo_story: Today I went to the zoo. I saw a (Noun Animal) jumping up and down in its tree. He (Verb Past Tense) quickly through the large tunnel that led to its huge (Noun). I got some peanuts and passed them through the cage to a gigantic gray (Noun) towering above my head. Feeding that animal made me hungry. I went to get a (Adjective) scoop of ice cream. It filled my stomach. Afterwards I had to (Verb) quickly to catch our bus. When I got home I (Verb Past Tense) to my mom for a (Adjective) day at the zoo.
